name: SAHID LAXMAN JUBAK SANGH
briefDescription: Sahid Laxman Jubak Sangh (SLAJUS) is a registered voluntary organization  devoted to protection, promotion welfare and development of the schedule tribe (ST), schedule cast (SC), indigenous minority, vulnerable including women, children and most neglected community. The society is not at aligning itself with any political, religious and/or communal ideology of any party inside or outside India.
